channel.title: Remakes Of Popular Electronic Songs
channel.description:
You know what I’ve been noticing? A lot of people have made good remakes of Electronic Songs (including me.)
What song did I remake? I remade Aphex Twin’s “Come To Daddy”. (It is subpar because I don’t have the money to pay for a full Auxy subscription, which means I can only use the demo sounds, as well as Egg and Pasta.)
https://app.auxy.co/projects/jgHCOkwEZBRqvpc4xPKwng==
And @eswyn remade Deadmau5’s The Veldt.
https://app.auxy.co/projects/WLs2IdNNCk9CDBBxK9bxmw==
@LMG remade Hoohah by Fox Stevenson and Curbi, as well as Dying and I Love You by OMFG.
https://app.auxy.co/projects/ftPfLMm9LsN4SP8A8l4L4w
https://app.auxy.co/projects/UHhWLwtfWTmA3huwmUVixw==
https://app.auxy.co/projects/Mz80l59BTzmYKFLUFbr0Cg==
@anon41616463 remade Martin Garrix’s Animals
https://app.auxy.co/projects/ehoAzlDjX1RhxN2yWEYMBg==
And the list goes on and on and on...well, you get the idea.

item.title: Remakes Of Popular Electronic Songs
item.dc:creator: Hum4n01d
item.description:
https://app.auxy.co/projects/DXh-kLAg_P1imj1KI0a5jg==

I also fixed the animals one lol didn’t see your message @Aadam

It’s not perfect but I fixed the rhythmic mistakes

Read full topic

item.description:
Ok. I would actually like to see someone do the Drop with the wood block demo sound.

Read full topic

item.title: Remakes Of Popular Electronic Songs
item.dc:creator: Aadam
item.description:
The drop instrument is a little off, and the breakdown beat is a little off too.

https://app.auxy.co/projects/8wqoBHUIH33InDvk5nZKJg== Here is the breakdown beat.

item.title: Remakes Of Popular Electronic Songs
item.dc:creator: Aadam
item.description:
Sorry to say, but @anon41616463 made animals incorrectly.

Read full topic

item.title: Remakes Of Popular Electronic Songs
item.dc:creator: Slash
item.description:
I know. I wish I saw more remakes nowadays. Especially of older songs. But you know, I really accidentally recreated Aphex Twin’s “Come To Daddy” by accident. I was trying to create a country song, but it came out sounding like the song with the scariest music video in the history of music videos. And then I just kind of put my own spin on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Remakes Of Popular Electronic Songs
item.dc:creator: Hum4n01d
item.description:
Wow, some of these are really great!

Read full topic
